DataElement.preferredName: Causality Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity Actual Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The judgment of relatedness between an adverse event and an activity or observation result. The period of time over which the activity is performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Causality Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity Actual Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The principle that a relationship exists between a primary entity A, or cause, and the occurrence of a secondary entity B, or effect.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Existing in fact; real.:The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Causality Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The principle that a relationship exists between a primary entity A, or cause, and the occurrence of a secondary entity B, or effect.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: The principle that a relationship exists between a primary entity A, or cause, and the occurrence of a secondary entity B, or effect.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Existing in fact; real.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains PQ to have units that describe a period of time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
